website_summaries.verdict: A fully waterproof and weather resistant fishing camera that makes finding fish in any condition much easier, day or night.
pros: The seven inch monitor holds up well under the elements of rain and snow
Camera is well built also, and is durable in even icy conditions
Comes with a visor to help visibility under the sunlight
Light and compact, so it travels well
Strong battery life that lasts anywhere from nine to 12 hours
cons: No SD card or record function could be a huge deal breaker for many
Not the greatest in low light or dark waters

customer_reviews.title: Great value and clear picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my husband and I to use when we go ice fishing. When the water is deep and we can’t see the bottom, this works great to scout out the fish for us. We use it at well-below freezing temps and it works like a dream. The video we took doesn’t do it justice. The picture is far clearer than we expected, especially for being underwater. The bright light also seems to attract fish, which is an added bonus. You can see a small school of fish swimming near the end of the video. Right after we finished recording, a large trout approached the camera, then bit our bait! We’re glad we purchased this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tormoen

customer_reviews.title: Best Underwater Camera Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best underwater camera and at a great price. I had very low hopes for it but I figured I would give it a try. Well, i was VERY pleasantly surprised when it surpassed all of my expectations. It is easy and intuitive to use and provides a great picture. And the lighting is fantastic. i was expecting it to not be very bright, but those LED lights bring light to everything you are looking at. Would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Person who received it LOVES it and uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of the brand prior to my purchase. Love my camera. Had a great time using it while ice fishing
customer_reviews.author: Jodi K

customer_reviews.title: Great for ice fishing
customer_reviews.text: Great camera to get out ice fishing with the led helps a lot with murky water. Keeps the kids entertained when fish are not biting too.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Works great for ice fishing.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Had issues with battery but solved that. Good picture and we can see the jig while ice fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Cool item
customer_reviews.text: Such a great concept. Takes a pic to get a clear picture but my husband loves posting his bites on social media.
customer_reviews.author: Kris B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up. The clarity is excellent. I have only played with it in our pool, but I will be taking it to the river soon to give it a real test. I would have given it 5 stars if there had better instructions on how to use it while fishing. Also, a good video showing it in use underwater and rigged for fishing would have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Vassallo

customer_reviews.title: Works....sorta....
customer_reviews.text: Great camera....until you put it underwater. Clear water...daylight...can't see anything
customer_reviews.author: John Edward Sebesta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent underwater video at bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great at a fraction of the cost of the name brand. Picture is razor sharp. The use of 18650 batteries means that if battery pack should fail it can be readily repaired. Can’t wait to try it at night. Those pesky fishes gonna have to watch out.
customer_reviews.author: Petrodog

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: Rose in anyson customer service is very easy to work with. I like my cam and I have used many cams for years. This one is my favorite because it's light it works the same as my 400.00 cam but I can turn the light off on this one. The instructions as to what the clips do should be included so that rose can enjoy her tea.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!! This camera only lasted 4 times of use. Seller unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: You have to get close to something to see it but it is clear as daylight
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Could use some instructions on the clips and camera cable. Works good and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: anton William herres

customer_reviews.title: Good value over all
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it as the water in our lake was too murky to make any fish visible. Impressive packaging and thoughtful details included in the kit. Good value over all.
customer_reviews.author: DietCokeisafoodgroup

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product, I got it for my husband for his birthday, and we have used it so much! I really enjoyed everything it had to offer. The camera worked really good up until the point we accidently aimed it at the sun, but it only took a minute or two to return back to normal. I really liked it!
customer_reviews.author: dodo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: That I can use it on the job too,I'm in construction
customer_reviews.author: David Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Good picture Great camera for the price I love dealing ...
customer_reviews.text: Good picture Great camera for the price I love dealing with Amazon Top notch service!
customer_reviews.author: Ivory L Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise but no long term data
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift so I don't know how it will work over the long term, but I did try it out to make sure it works before giving it. I was hesitant because frankly, it is a lot cheaper than the other ones I've looked at. But I was pleasantly surprised, the picture was clear and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Iceboxannie

customer_reviews.title: product received was broken
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was broken. I finally got some ink for my printer, to print the return label. But was just outside the 30 day return window. guess i'm out some $'s In the picture you can see the connection that was broken. the pin in the "male" part was stuck in the "female" part.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P

customer_reviews.title: battery wont charge, not sure if its battery or ...
customer_reviews.text: battery wont charge, not sure if its battery or charger, will see if they replace it before I post more.
customer_reviews.author: Val C.

customer_reviews.title: ... sdcard so this is just a camera not to happy about that payed good money for this other than ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and this was supposed to be a video camera there is no place to put the sdcard so this is just a camera not to happy about that payed good money for this other than that works fine
customer_reviews.author: Randy anderson

customer_reviews.title: it's great. No instructions on how to attach it to ...
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, it's great. No instructions on how to attach it to a pole. Now think about it you can't cast it. We all want to see it live, but if your not trolling in clear water. Think again about this one.
customer_reviews.author: billyzzzz

customer_reviews.title: SELLER NOT HONEST
customer_reviews.text: received it with dead batteries, hard to replace!! seller wouldn't make good on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clear image
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped this camera had a SD card feature but it does not otherwise the system does work great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marrs

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: great bargin prices. Can always find what I'm looking for. Great delivery time. Overall excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Closser

customer_reviews.title: 2 large scratches in monitor
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great. Just 2 deep scratches on the monitor. I will change my review to 5 stars if they fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Battery is dead
customer_reviews.text: Camera works fine, but battery won’t take a charge after one cycle. Replacements are hard to find and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Woolsey

customer_reviews.title: does  not work
customer_reviews.text: never used it on the water...did power up when i got it...went out on the water today and it wont power up...junk monitor...
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to be able to see fish underwater and whatever the kids throw under the fishing dock. You can see well enough but you can't hold the camera still in the water with the cable. Unless you have your hand holding the camera, you can't really see much because the water moves it around so much. I thought it would be easier to control.
customer_reviews.author: Stargatesj

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of the battery’s is bad can’t get camera to work
customer_reviews.author: brad lawson

customer_reviews.title: The best time of our lives
customer_reviews.text: This is so all some if you fish or not I took mine gulf shores in Alabama and got to see the fish with getting in the water and so simple to use the only thing you need to do is tie a staging line to it so you don't pull on the cord other than it is all some people I recommend it highly
customer_reviews.author: Jerone Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for ice fishing. Everything looks great picture is very clear! We can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a great quality and half the price of the aqua view. It very portable and easy to use, and the company has great customer sevice
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: How can you buy a replacement battery?
customer_reviews.text: I have the camera and it works ok. I can see some fish during the day. I was wondering where can I buy a replacement battery for this?
customer_reviews.author: Hans Klopp

product_meta.title: Anysun Underwater Fish Finder - Professional Fishing Video Camera with 7" TFT Color LCD HD Monitor 700TVL, CCD 15M Cable Length with Carry Case - Fun to See Fish Biting
product_meta.description:
Product Description:

This Anysun Underwater Fish Finder Video Camera product is the latest, most popular and convenient Underwater Video Camera System.

Features:

 * 700TVL HD camera,clear picture.
 * with 12 highlight night-vision lights, which can fill the light well.
 * night-vision light can be controlled by the switch
 * special cold-resistant water-proof,and anti-pressing cable
 * 7 inch color TFT LCD Screen.
 * 7 inch TFT color monitor with sun-visor for bright environment outside。with removable sunshield
 * The casing of camera is all made of metal, firm and durable.
 * Waterproof Level: IP68

Specification:

 * Charger:100VAC-240VAC DC12.6V 1000MA
 * Battery:Lithium battery 4.5AH,The continuous using time of the battery is up to 10 hours
 * Depth:15m
 * Night Vision:12 pcs Infrared LED Image:color
 * Viewing Distance:0-5m
 * Pressure:5 MPa
 * Resolution:1000TVL
 * Voltage:12VDC
 * Work Temperature:-20--60 degree
 * Storage Temperature:-30--80 degree
 * Weight:2KG

Package Included:

1x 7" TFT Fish Finder Monitor

1x Video Camera with cable and wheel

1x Li-battery

1x US Charger

1x Set of Metal Clip

1x Carry Case

1x User Manual

1x Float
feature_bullets: IP68 Fish Finder Camera with Night Version：full waterproof IP68 design with 15m cable，can work in dark night and 15m deep water.
MONITOR: 7 inch TFT color monitor with sun-visor ideal for bright environments. It is cold-resistant and waterproof with pull-resistant cables.
IMAGE QUALITY: Color CCD and HD 700 TV lines of the camera provides a clearer image than a 600TV lines camera. This is the latest and most convenient Underwater Video Camera System.
LONG BATTERY: 9-12H Working Time:built-in high capacity recharge battery,full charged could work all day.

WIDELY USED OCCASIONS: This underwater camera is suitable for many places, you can take it for lake fishing,ice fishing,sea fishing, boat fishing, fishing on the island and .you can take your fishing game to the next level with our amazing portable fish finder.
